meanings.definition: Relating to or located near the ethmoid bone.
meanings.sent1: The ethmoidal bone is found in the skull.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the ethmoidal structure in the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The ethmoidal bone decided to take a break from holding up the skull.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the ethmoidal bone in her head.
meanings.sent5: The ethmoidal feature was as intricate as a spider's web.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ethmoid sinus.
meanings.sent1: The ethmoidal sinus helps with air circulation in the skull.
meanings.sent2: She felt pressure in her head due to an ethmoidal issue.
meanings.sent3: The ethmoidal sinus threw a party for the other sinuses.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were as clear as an ethmoidal sinus after a cold.
meanings.sent5: The ethmoidal passage was as narrow as a secret tunnel.
